info.title: Response Validator API
info.description: Validates LLM responses against query evidence using INDEPENDENT verification. The validator re-executes the SQL query to get actual data - never trusts data passed by the agent.

get.summary: Validate response against actual query evidence
get.description: Validates response by INDEPENDENTLY re-executing the SQL query to get actual data. Compares claims in the response against real query results. Returns action: PASS (grounded), SANITIZE (some claims removed), or BLOCK (critical fabrications detected).

parameters.name: response_text
parameters.description: The LLM-generated response text to validate. Must be your draft response before presenting to user.

parameters.name: sql_executed
parameters.description: The exact SQL query that was executed by execute_sql. The validator will re-run this query independently to verify claims.

action.description: PASS: Response is fully grounded. SANITIZE: Unverified claims removed. BLOCK: Critical fabrications detected.

validated_response.description: The validated response text. Use this instead of your original draft.

confidence_score.description: 0.0-1.0 grounding score based on claim verification

violations_count.description: Number of fabricated or unverified claims detected

details.description: Detailed verification results including actual_row_count and invalid_claims
